page.title: 09A Day At Eckington School.
page.content: I usually leave home at 8.50 and go in the car to school. I reach school at 8.52. When I have put my coat and bag away , and mum has put my sandwich box away, I wait in te corridor with my mum until 9.00. When 9.00 comes the bell rings and I say goodbye to mum and go into assembly. We sing a hymn, say our prayers then go into class and do Maths Adventure. At 10.40 the bell goes and we go to play. At 10.55 the bell goes again and we come in and write stories for the Domesday Project. The bell goes for dinner time at 12.00.We all go into the assembly hall to have dinner. I usually have tomato sandwiches, a chocolate biscuit, an apple and a drink. then I go and play tag. At 1.20 I change for PE,in PE we play pinball. At 2.00 we go back to class and read. At 2.25 the bell goes again and we change back.
